Solution We solve the incumbent problem by value function iteration. We discretize the firm-level shock with 35 grid points using the method in Rouwenhorst (1995). We discretize the capital grid using 200 grid points, the net leverage grid for old-economy firms using 100 grid points, and the cash grid for new-economy firms using 100 grid points. We also scale the revenue function so that the capital choice is between zero and 1. We also solve the entrant problem by value function iteration. We discretize the signal space using 100 grid points. The lower (upper) bound of the signal grid coincides with the lower (upper) bound of the firm-level shock grid.
